name: Shop Til You Drop
overview: As a world-class shopper, you will only buy items that are on sale. Your local store has 45 Blue-light specials on sale an d it is your job to find as many as you can and get them to the checkout counter. The problem is, the other shoppers in the store are all maniacs who will knock you down and steal your purchases. Get as many of the sale items to the checkout counter as you can. If you can score all 45, you are indeed a WORLD CLASS SHOPPER!
